TopicTitle: Hi guys im new on this website.

Articles.Content: Ive played ksp alot and have been active on the subreddit, finally got around to making an account here.
Hello Campbell, and welcome to the forum. I visit the Kerbal reddit sometimes, too, but the community here is more active. I expect you'll like it.
Welcome aboard, cadet! Yes, I've never been much of a Redditor myself, but the forums will suit you just fine in any case.
